name: pil-lfsr
description: Implementation of a Linear-Feedback Shift Register (LFSR) in PIL.

scripts.starksetup: node node_modules/pil-stark/src/main_buildconsttree.js -c build/lfsr.const.bin -p src/lfsr.pil -s src/starkstruct.json -t build/lfsr.consttree.bin -v build/lfsr.verkey.json
scripts.starkprove: node node_modules/pil-stark/src/main_prover.js -m build/lfsr.commit.bin -c build/lfsr.const.bin -t build/lfsr.consttree.bin -p src/lfsr.pil -s src/starkstruct.json -o build/lfsr-proof.json -z build/lfsr-proof.zkin.json -b build/lfsr-public.json
scripts.starkverify: node node_modules/pil-stark/src/main_verifier.js -p src/lfsr.pil -s src/starkstruct.json -v build/lfsr.verkey.json -o build/lfsr-proof.json -b build/lfsr-public.json

author: HÃ©ctor Masip Ardevol
